content.html: According to messages shared in Twitter Slack, Twitter’s CISO, chief privacy office, and chief compliance officer all resigned last night. An employee says it will be up to engineers to “self-certify compliance with FTC requirements and other laws.”
content.value:
According to messages shared in Twitter Slack, Twitter’s CISO, chief privacy office, and chief compliance officer all resigned last night.

An employee says it will be up to engineers to “self-certify compliance with FTC requirements and other laws.”

content.html:
do you know what level of fuckery is required to get your CISO, chief privacy officer, and chief compliance officer to all resign at once? i suspect we’ll have a good idea of exactly what’s going down by EOD and it’s gonna be Bad.
twitter.com/caseynewton/st…
content.value:
do you know what level of fuckery is required to get your CISO, chief privacy officer, and chief compliance officer to all resign at once?

i suspect we’ll have a good idea of exactly what’s going down by EOD and it’s gonna be Bad.
